p: Strikingly, among a total of 3220 SARS-CoV-2 positive patients, only 0.80% (27/3220) were paediatric (<18 years), while 99.2% were adult (>18 years). A complete picture of the age distribution of all positive cases is reported in Fig. 1 A,B. The age of paediatric patients ranged from 4 months to 17 years (median, 11 years). Forty-eight per cent (13/27) were aged 12–17 years, 26% (7/27) were aged 6–11 years, and 26% (7/27) were <6 years.
